reviewText:
Great movie that still hasn't been released in the US & Canada.

Stars include Mark Hamill, Jean Simmons, Jonathan Taylor-Thomas, Michael Dorn, Daniel Davis, Peri Gilpin & Kellie Martin

An animated fantasy sci-fi movie that will thrill (and appropriate for) all ages.

US Rating is PG (for violence).

Dutch rating is 6 (for ages 6 and older).

Language is English and has only Dutch subtitles.

Audio is 5.1 Dolby Surround.

Based on a story by Jean "Moebius" Giraud, who was also the Production Designer for this movie. Jean was also the production designer for the movie TRON.

Produced by David Kirschner & Frank Foster
